meta.title: Art
meta.description: Enjoying life, one drawing at a time.

about.title: About
about.p1: Drawing whatever I feel like, whenever I feel like it, for whoever I feel like.
about.p2: I work happily from my studio in Santa Teresita, Guadalajara, Mexico.
